metatags.description: The acceptance criteria for accessibility are a set of conditions that must be completed in order for a feature to be deemed accessible. Acceptance criteria are a useful resource for development teams because they allow for more granularity than broad technical standards like the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG). Download our FREE WCAG 2.1 checklist […]
